originalText.text: We hired Sasha and her team for our wedding in July of 2023 and are very happy and satisfied with the photos (and video to come). Sasha is very easy to communicate with from the onset of the process and provided her suggestions from her past experiences which I found very helpful. Sasha and her team were not only very professional but were also friendly and easy to work with on the day of the wedding, this really helps me and my husband to be more relax and having candid moments to be captured. I would 100% recommend Sasha as your photographer if you have a preference for candid and bright photos.

originalText.text:
Even during my early wedding planning days, I knew that the two most important things to invest in for my wedding were 1) great food and 2) a great photography team. I am a very sentimental person and I treasure memories captured in photos and videos. I knew that finding a great photographer for my wedding would require extensive research and it was very important to find just the right one for my event. I dont remember exactly how I came upon Sasha Chou (probably google) but I do remember her sitting pretty comfortably on the top of my potential vendors-list for awhile before I made my final decision to commit.

What stuck out to me about Sasha was her wedding packages and most importantly, her photography style. I was debating if I really needed videography and if I really needed 2 photographers and videographers at that. And if I needed an engagement photoshoot (the answer is yes, ofc ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚) In the end, it seemed like a worthwhile investment to have a dual team for both, and Sasha happened to offer a reasonably priced package for just that. She also offered a 1 hr engagement shoot to better fit my needs. In addition, she and her team offered 9 hours of work, which also fit my needs. She was also probably about $3000 less expensive than another company I was considering, so that was a plus as well. I also do value supporting female-owned businesses as well as Asian businesses.

Besides affordability, I also really liked Sashaâ€™s photography style for weddings. Im not really into dark and moody, nor am I really into the super serious editorial look either. I like a mixture of traditional photography (poses and setup of photos) paired with a bit of fine-arts photography (airy feels, natural lighting and nice backdrops). I also enjoy when a photographer doesnt do much more to photos other than enhancing the contrast in the image just a bit. Fun fact: the only filters I ever like and use are ones that simply enhance contrast and/or brightness of an image.

Working with Sasha was pretty straightforward, and I mean this in terms of communication through email, over the phone, and in person. I do remember that after our initial engagement session, my husband did remark that he liked that she could make us laugh. When I got the engagement photos, I was quite happy with how they turned out. The photos had nice color and they just felt airy and light.

Sasha and her team arrived to the venue early on the day of my wedding. And they worked efficiently with capturing my dress and details and all of our couple-photos, family photos, and wedding party photos. I expected the whole process to take more than 2.5 hours, but we were done quicker than that. I also liked that she and her team were gentle and respectful with handling our parents, who are much less familiar with the whole photo-process.

The rest of my wedding day was a bit of a blur, but I know they were working hard for us for the whole evening. They stayed a little bit past the agreed upon time of 9:30 PM to capture some last minute details, and I appreciate that. Im so excited to see my photos. Im sure theyâ€™ll be good.

I would definitely recommend Sasha and her team for any wedding.

PS I can proudly say that I was the one who taught Sasha how to share her screen on Google Meets ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

originalText.text: We are so grateful to have Sasha and her team capture photos and videos for our wedding. Sasha and her team are professional, creative and very fast! It was so easy to work with them. The video team - Jan and Ben did a fantastic job. Everything looked so cinematic with breathtaking aerial shots, non linear video editing, amazing audio and mind blowing gimbal shots for the wedding film. It felt like we were watching a million dollar hollywood movie. All the photos and videos were delivered quickly. We cant thank them enough for capturing our priceless moments. We highly recommend Sasha Chou Photography!!!

We highly recommend Sasha Chou Photography!!!

originalText.text: We booked Sasha and her team (Jay and Annie) for our wedding day in NY this past May and are incredibly happy with our decision! In our first conversation we found she was really easy to talk to, was genuinely interested in learning more about our story and what we wanted, and even worked within our budget to accommodate a videographer. The day of the wedding she and her team were so easy to work with. She has a way of both giving suggestions/directing and going with the flow which made the day so smooth and pleasant. The team effortlessly moved around our wedding guests and captured the most beautiful moments on our big day. My wife and I are from two different cultural backgrounds and Sashaâ€™s team was able to incorporate all the elements of our traditions  into the pictures and videos. Sasha and her team took into account everything that we asked and went above and beyond to give us a great final product, would highly highly recommend!

originalText.text: A photoshoot for our engagement was something I don't think either me or my fiancÃ© ever thought we would do. It ended up being a wholeheartedly fun and memorable experience. Sasha is an incredibly genuine person who naturally inspires the best from her subjects. She is infinitely talanted but also humble and hard working. We are grateful to have met Sasha. She also has the best food suggestions.
